level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules as necessary to implement the provisions of this chapter.
Pursuant to Unit A of Chapter 3 of Title 2, the Mayor may execute contracts, grants, and other legally binding documents to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 109 of Developmental Disabilities Services Management Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-672, December 28, 2006, 54 DCR 1155).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-264, see notes following ยง 7-761.01.
